properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_UNIQUE , M.MEM_ID , R.REF_TYPE , REF_NO , C.CPOST_TITLE , ADOPT_TITLE , AN_TITLE , DO_TITLE , VOL_TITLE , REPORT_REASON , REPORT_DATE FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN REPORT_REASON RE ON (RE.REPORT_NO = R.REPORT_NO) LEFT JOIN C_POST C ON (R.REF_TYPE = C.REF_TYPE) LEFT JOIN ANIMAL AN ON (R.REF_TYPE = AN.REF_TYPE) LEFT JOIN ADOPT A ON (R.REF_TYPE = A.REF_TYPE) LEFT JOIN DONATION D ON (R.REF_TYPE = D.REF_TYPE) LEFT JOIN VOLUNTEER V ON (R.REF_TYPE = V.REF_TYPE) WHERE REF_NO = ADOPT_NO OR REF_NO = AN_NO OR REF_NO = CPOST_NO OR REF_NO = DO_NO OR REF_NO = VOL_NO ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERTINTO REPORT(REPORT_UNIQUE, MEM_NO, REF_TYPE, REF_NO, REPORT_NO, REPORT_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, ?, 'POST', ?, ?, SYSDATE)
